name: products_get_offers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consumer_reports.
Tool description: This API helps to query trusted ratings and reviews for the products, cars and services used every day to create a review site such as : consumerreports.org
API description: Fetches offers for a specific product model from various sites.

modelid.description: The unique identifier of the product model for which to fetch offers.

page.description: The page index for pagination, starting from 0. Default is 0.

size.description: The number of items per page for pagination. Default is 100.
